scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npm run build:renderer && NODE_ENV=development node ./node_modules/electron/cli.js .
scripts.package: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --dir
scripts.make: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:renderer && NODE_ENV=production electron-forge make
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --config electron-builder.yml --publish never
scripts.build:win: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --win --x64 --publish never
scripts.publish: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --config electron-builder.yml --publish always
scripts.package:mac: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --mac --dir
scripts.package:win: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --win --dir
scripts.build:mac:dmg: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --mac dmg
scripts.build:win:nsis: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --win nsis
